sqlMap.insert: insert into category (id, title, blogId) values(#id#, #title#, #blog.id#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT c.id as id, c.title as title FROM category c join blogs b on b.id = c.blogId where c.blogId = #blogId# order by c.id desc
SELECT c.id as id FROM category c join blogs b on b.id = c.blogId where c.blogId = #blogId# order by c.id desc limit 1
SELECT c.id as id, c.title as title FROM category c join blogs b on b.id = c.blogId where c.blogId = #blogId# and c.id = #id#
sqlMap.update: update category set title = #title# where id = #id# and blogId = #blog.id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from category where id = #id# and blogId = #blog.id#
